welcome_message_body: "Welcome to East Massapequa, where small-town charm meets big-city opportunities! Get ready to experience our beautiful beaches, delicious seafood, and vibrant community. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial flights and includes check-in counters, baggage claim, and departure gates.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal caters to private and charter flights, with separate facilities for passengers and crew members.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Serves international airlines such as Lufthansa, Air France, and Japan Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Serves Delta Airlines domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Serves international airlines such as Virgin Atlantic, Emirates, and Qatar Airways.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Serves international airlines such as British Airways, El Al, and Etihad Airways.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: Serves JetBlue Airways domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: Serves international airlines such as United Airlines, Alaska Airlines, and Iberia.

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: Serves American Airlines domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Premium WiFi is also available for purchase.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal mainly serves Delta Air Lines and its partners.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves various airlines, including American Airlines, Southwest Airlines, and JetBlue.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves United Airlines and its partners.

wifi.note: The WiFi is free for the first 30 minutes, after which a fee may apply.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Westchester County Apt Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The private aviation terminal at Westchester County Apt Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
